column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I had the spicy vegan ramen.  It has a creamy broth
column5: and some other green stuff.  The broth was flavorful and satisfying
column6: but I didn't think it was spicy enough to be labeled spicy.  I also wish there had been more garlic chips-- didn't get much garlic flavor.  But it was pretty good for vegan ramen!
